long_description: The women's Pepper's Lynn Polarized Sunglasses offer sweet style and protection from glare and UV rays. Tri-acetate polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Shatterproof lenses provide 100% UV protection. Lightweight polycarbonate frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility at any temperature, and are extremely impact-resistant.
short_description: The women's Pepper's Lynn Polarized Sunglasses offer sweet style and protection from glare and UV rays.
